code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Header from'./components/Header';import RestaurantList from'./components/RestaurantList';import OrderForm from'./components/OrderForm';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState([]);const[selectedRestaurant,setSelectedRestaurant]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/restaurants').then(response=>setRestaurants(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching restaurants:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:!selectedRestaurant?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RestaurantList,{restaurants:restaurants,onSelect:setSelectedRestaurant}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderForm,{restaurant:selectedRestaurant,onBack:()=>setSelectedRestaurant(null)})})]});}export default App;
